histogram.name: Ash.WelcomeTour.Aborted.Reason
histogram.summary: Records the reason that the Welcome Tour was aborted after starting.

histogram.name: Ash.WelcomeTour.Prevented.Reason
histogram.summary: Records the reason that the Welcome Tour was prevented from starting. Only logged when the feature flag is turned on, but the tour was not shown for another reason.

histogram.name: Ash.WelcomeTour.Step.Aborted
histogram.summary: Records that the Welcome Tour was aborted on a given step.

histogram.name: Ash.WelcomeTour.Step.Duration.{Step}
histogram.summary: Records the duration of the {Step} step of the Welcome Tour.

histogram.name: Ash.WelcomeTour.Step.Shown
histogram.summary: Records that a step of the Welcome Tour was shown. Each step should be recorded either 0 or 1 times for any given user, depending on how far into the tour the user proceeds.

histogram.name: Ash.WelcomeTour.{Completion}.Duration
histogram.summary: Records the duration of the Welcome Tour when it has been {Completion}, starting from when dialog shows.

histogram.name: Ash.WelcomeTour.{Completion}.Interaction.Count
histogram.summary: Records each time the user performs the given interaction when the tour was {Completion}.

histogram.name: Ash.WelcomeTour.{Completion}.Interaction.FirstTime.{Interaction}
histogram.summary: Records the time it took the user to interact with {Interaction}, when the tour was {Completion}.

variant.name: Search
variant.summary: the search box in the Launcher
